title: 3 & 4 Bdrms, 2 Car Garages, Apply by 8/7 & get 1 mo. free
posting_body: From the moment you arrive at Amber Creek, you'll feel like you've come home.
Our beautiful community is conveniently located in Thornton Colorado, just 10 miles north of Denver and within proximity to the Denver-Aurora-Lakewood metropolitan area.
Enjoy small-town charm near big city amenities!
These brand-new, rental homes have carefully curated floor plans for any lifestyle.
We offer both three and four-bedroom floor plans to choose from with two-car garages, fenced-in backyards, and more.
Experience maintenance-free living so you worry less and enjoy more!
Surrounded by scenic views with enviable community amenities and a team dedicated to providing quick and excellent service, Amber Creek has it all.
Use this link for more information:
This is a 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1468 Sq.
- Within Proximity to the Denver-Aurora-Lakewood Metropolitan Area
